subsections.text:
IBM Cloud for Financial Services is a new top level section of Bluemix. This was a fairly substantial undertaking aimed at introducing new financial API's to Bluemix, as well as creating a better project management system in Bluemix.

I was leading a team of three developers to deliver this experience and integrate and extend Bluemix's CloudFoundry backend, and was also working as a UX designer in the initial weeks of this project.

This work ended up headlining a conference, and also showcased the Investment Insights with Watson software that I also created.
